Posts.Content: She seems to not understand how scary it is to hear this. What she has written is that at one part (4o'clock) of the breast, there is something (how it feels, density) she is concerned with and wants to rule out any problems. I wouldn't get worried until you have something to worry about. I have had to go in for multiple mamos and ultrasounds. It is scary. The biopsy was the worst. But, worrying makes it worse. Good luck.
Posts.Title: Breast Density
